Human-centered

Creator Studio

Cloud development environment for building location-based AR of any scale. We take care of technical complexity so you can focus on the creative part

Static ar

No code

Create static AR using only mobile phone

  • Scan

  • Place Content

  • Publish

Interactive

Advanced interactive AR experiences

Scanner app

Use our mobile app for scanning and placing geolocation anchors

Scene Editor

Place the content with the mobile app in the live edit mode or use the browser-based desktop editor

Code Editor

  • Browser-based Visual Code editor
  • Build client-side and server-side components in JavaScript
  • Build a home page for your dimension in ReactJS
  • Command line tools for managing frontend and backend of the dimension

Staging

Development staging environment allows testing and live preview of AR experience before it goes to production

Distribution

No need to build dedicated iOS or Android apps. Your dimension is published in the metaverse with a click of a button. Automatically supported on every major platform including AR glasses
